meter_reading.notes: Meter orientation check: BADGER METER text at top, digital display readable left-to-right. White digits (5 digits on left): 0 2 2 7 1 = 2271 m³. Black digit (single digit on right, separated): 4 = 0.4 m³. Red dial analysis: Dial orientation: '0' mark at top of dial, '5' mark at bottom of dial. Dial number scale position: pointing at approximately 2.5, Clock position: 3 o'clock, Degrees: 90° (pointing RIGHT), Verification: Hand is pointing RIGHT ✓. Dial reading: 90/3600 = 0.025 m³. Total: 2271.425 m³. Image is slightly out of focus which made the black digit difficult to read with certainty, appears to be 4.
